# Release Notes

## v4.0.0 (2016-12-03)
### Added
- PHP 7.1

## v3.1.0 (2016-11-29)
### Added
- Fixed bad previous version number (2.2.1 -> 3.0.2 -> 2.2.2)
- Upgraded to Ubuntu 16.04

## v3.0.2 (2016-02-16)

- Added init script for Windows ([#302](https://git.io/vajdA))

### Changed
